summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 716 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 784.5m higher than yesterday, 124.6m lower than the past week, 715.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 2050m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will feel quite humid. Chance of light rain, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
